mapper.select: select O1.O_NUM, O1.ID, O2.F_NUM, O2.R_NUM, O2.O_DATE, O2.O_COUNT, O2.O_PRICE, F.F_NAME, F.F_PRICE from ORDERS_NUM O1, ORDERS O2, FOOD F where O1.O_NUM = O2.O_NUM and O1.ID = #{userId} and O2.F_NUM = F.F_NUM

select O1.O_NUM, O1.ID, O2.F_NUM, O2.R_NUM, O2.O_DATE, O2.O_COUNT, O2.O_PRICE, F.F_NAME, F.F_PRICE from ORDERS_NUM O1, ORDERS O2, FOOD F where O1.O_NUM = O2.O_NUM and O2.F_NUM = F.F_NUM order by O2.O_DATE DESC
